articles.author: Thomas Schlachter
articles.title: Bernardo Silva strikes twice to stun Real Madrid and send Manchester City to Champions League final - CNN
articles.description: Manchester City has an opportunity to win its first ever Champions League trophy after delivering a masterful performance against European giant Real Madrid on Wednesday.
articles.content:
Manchester City has an opportunity to win its first ever Champions League trophy after delivering a masterful performance against European giant Real Madrid on Wednesday.
